Is there any way to set a field as repeatable in code?
```
{% choice "type_of_content" label='Choose the type of content', value='Content', choices='Content, Single CTA' %}```

Is there a way to add in the current loop index into a label?

```
{% for section in sections|split(',', widget_data.sections_field.value) %}

{% choice "layout_field" 
label="Layout for block {{ loop.index }}", 
value="Content", choices="{{ layout }}", 
export_to_template_context=True, 
unique_in_loop=True 
%}

{% endfor %}```
